Class SoundManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.game.SoundManager

  • public class SoundManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Sound manager class for simple sound management throughout the game.
    Version:
    Winter 2018
    Author:
    Nabeel Vali, Kehlsey Lewis, Andrew Freiman
